ygData.title: FFS-Support
ygData.description: This group is a reference group primarily for transsexual/transgendered persons who are considering having, or who have already had, Facial Feminization Surgery (FFS). We discuss anything regarding preparation for, and recovery from, the surgery, as well as the factors involved in choosing an appropriate surgeon. It is also a forum for those who are questioning whether or not FFS is worth the risks, and benefits. It gives FFS pre-Ops a chance to talk with other people who have gone through the experience of FFS operations. FFS is literally life-changing. It is NOT an experiment. It is solely for those committed to improving their perception as women in their daily lives. Subsequently, we will not entertain membership from any aspirant who is unable to convince us that they are already living, or seriously intends to live full time as female. We limit the topics discussed to FFS-related issues only. This is NOT a contact group. Membership of this list is restricted to approved applicants only. ESSENTIAL to join: In order to join you should first apply to the list by pressing the 'Join This Group' button on this page (if visible). You will then be sent easy-to-follow instructions to becoming a full member. Please read them carefully, and reply as requested WITHIN 7 DAYS, or your pending membership might not be approved. Completing the on-screen 'reasons to join' box may NOT be sufficient to gain membership approval.
ygData.name: ffs-support
